analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x1bb0aff98d8d455b0cd651306aebedb31913b94e.sol:
	Contract BTHPoint has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x1bb0aff98d8d455b0cd651306aebedb31913b94e.sol#166-167)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
